projectDescription: A machine learning project for predicting market risk percentage using an LSTM model, complete with data preprocessing, model training, and a user-friendly shell-based input interface.
A tool to scan crops and predict healthy crops, crop rust, or powdery mildews.
Workout Buddy is a user-friendly website for tracking workouts, setting goals, and monitoring.
The Malfoy Blog is a Node.js, Express, and React-based platform for sharing personal blogs in a relaxed and creative manner, using a JSON server for content management.
